ðŸ“– Summary: PairDrop is a web-based application for cross-platform file sharing, inspired by AirDrop and forked from Snapdrop. It allows users to transfer files between devices on the same local network or over the internet using paired devices or temporary public rooms. Key features include persistent device pairing, an improved UI, and the ability to send files directly from share menus, context menus, or the command line.
